title: Rapid Dry LLC
full_address: 319 Schuyler Avenue Kearny NJ 07032 United States
description:
About
Rapid Dry is a full-service disaster restoration and construction company specializing in water damage restoration, fire damage restoration, mold remediation, and reconstruction services. We provide 24/7 emergency response to residential and commercial properties, ensuring fast and effective mitigation to minimize damage and downtime.

With a team of certified professionals, we handle everything from structural drying and smoke damage cleanup to complete reconstruction and remodeling. Our expertise extends to general construction, allowing us to rebuild and restore properties to their pre-loss condition efficiently.

At Rapid Dry, we are committed to delivering high-quality restoration solutions, industry-leading standards, and exceptional customer service. Whether it’s a burst pipe, fire damage, or full-scale property reconstruction, we have the knowledge, experience, and resources to get the job done right.
